com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet

Class Facet.NumericRangeFacet<T extends java.lang.Number>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet
      • com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.facet.Facet.NumericRangeFacet<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Spectated type of content from the field to be faceted. T should extend Number.
    Enclosing class:
    Facet

    public static class Facet.NumericRangeFacet<T extends java.lang.Number>
extends Facet
    This class allows to perform ranged facet query on a numeric field. A facet ranged query returns all the documents which have the specified field with a value included in a range defined by start and end. The result documents are faceted in the range steps of the size described by the property gap.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NumericRangeFacet

        public NumericRangeFacet(java.lang.String name,
                         FieldDescriptor<T> fieldDescriptor,
                         T start,
                         T end,
                         T gap,
                         java.lang.String... pivotNames)
        Constructor of the Facet.NumericRangeFacet providing all the needed configuration.
        Parameters:
        name - String with a custom name for the instance of the facet. It should be alphanumeric.
        fieldDescriptor - FieldDescriptor to do the range query on. T must extend Number.
        start - T Starting value of the defined range. T must extend Number.
        end - T Ending value of the defined range. T must extend Number.
        gap - T Size of the steps in which the range is divided to facet the results. T must extend Number.
        pivotNames - Name of the pivots using this facet.
